reviewText: Used this training on our pup and have contacted Jeremy several times and he is ALWAYS willing to help. Our pup is doing great!

Disappointed. Tried for over 1 year to implement this on my dog and he won't take. And I'm not being taken seriously by the owner. Very ubset that it didn't work, I can't use majority of the products I bought and I'm not being offered a refund.
Our 4 month old lab has found 3 horns using his methods!
New lab pup is enjoying the training. We have started the scent training and he is doing great. Thanks GUN DOG.
Very informative I have been using it on my puppies and have seen progress.
Arrived on time and as advertised

This video is the perfect complement to the training system also offered by Dog Bone.  It is brief, and lays the training process out in a very structured way, including showing a dog being trained by the process.  I watched the whole video, then went back and watched each phase of the training individually, and will continue to do so as my dog goes through the process.
Helped a lot with our pup
